meanings.sent1: The movie star looked glammier than ever on the red carpet.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was glammier than mine at the party.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat tried to look glammier by wearing a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night made everything look glammier, like a fairy tale come to life.
meanings.sent5: The glammier decorations at the event made it unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The glammier outfit she wore outshone all the others.
meanings.sent2: The glammier car in the showroom caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The glammier cake at the party had edible glitter on top.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as glammier as a Hollywood star's on the magazine cover.
meanings.sent5: The glammier jewelry sparkled under the lights, drawing admiring glances.
